entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse VP Pence we thank you for your tireless contribution, leadership and moral compass during the COVID19 crisis. You and your team’s efforts, experience and expertise saved countless American lives.
